tag_line: An overhaul of the steering input system for controller and keyboard.
title: Arcade Steering
message:
[B][I]
This is a complete overhaul of BeamNG's steering input system for controller and keyboard players.[/I][/B]

[CENTER][IMG]https://i.imgur.com/CGhkVZe.png[/IMG][/CENTER]

Arcade Steering aims to give vehicles a more intuitive steering feel that makes driving more predictable and fun. It's suited for all kinds of driving including track racing, rallying, drifting etc.

The main features include:
[LIST]
[*]Accurate steering limit to utilize the steered wheels' peak grip
[LIST]
[*]This is similar to the [I]Understeer reduction assistant[/I] in 0.26+
[/LIST]
[*]Natural countersteer tendency, simulating the effects of the car's caster angle
[LIST]
[*]This is similar to the [I]Oversteer reduction assistant[/I] in 0.26+
[/LIST]
[*]More refined steering feel compared to the stock assists
[*]Highly customizable settings
[/LIST]
Despite the "arcade" name this isn't an unrealistic or artificial driver-aid. The mod mostly mimics how the steering behaves on real cars, and makes controller and keyboard driving more on par with using a force-feedback steering wheel.

The mod includes a UI app called [I]Arcade Steering Settings[/I] which lets you fine tune the steering feel to your liking, although the default settings should be fine for most people.

[CENTER][IMG]https://i.imgur.com/9QktZO0.png[/IMG][/CENTER]

For more info you can visit the project's [URL='https://github.com/adam10603/BeamNG-Arcade-Steering'][B][U]Github page[/U][/B][/URL] which also has a [URL='https://github.com/adam10603/BeamNG-Arcade-Steering/blob/main/ConfigGuide.md'][B][U]configuration guide[/U][/B][/URL] explaining all the settings, or you can visit the mod's [URL='https://www.beamng.com/threads/arcade-steering-mod.85494/'][B][U]forum thread[/U][/B][/URL] for discussions.

Have fun!
